data.description: DBI Driver for Amazon ECS API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBD::Amazon is requested since it is a DBI driver for the Amazon
    ECS API. This driver provides access to the Amazon ECS using SQL
    statements and a data model oriented architecture. It should be
    listed since it provides both a novel example of using the DBI, and
    a simplified method for accessing the Amazon web services API.
